translations: n.医生；体格检查（medical 的复数）

phrs.translation: 医疗设备；医疗器材；人体医疗配件
医学技术，医疗技术；医学检验

sentences.sentence: Due to its antibacterial properties, Silver nanoparticles has been widely used in various fields, such as environment, agriculture and medicals, etc.
sentences.translation: 纳米银因其优越的抗菌性能被广泛应用于环境、农业、医药等各个领域。

sentences.sentence: They include health care system, sanitary resources quality of medicals Services, ages, kinds of disease, psychological factors, economic status, traffic and so on.
sentences.translation: 认为这种倾向的产生与医疗保健制度、卫生资源、医疗服务质量、患者年龄、病种、病情，心理状态、经济条件及交通等因素有关。

sentences.sentence: Our products have been widely applied ranging from communications, electronics, computers, cars, magnetic levitation vehicles, oil industries, medicals, motors and magnetic separations.
sentences.translation: 公司产品已广泛应用于通讯、电子、计算机、汽车、磁悬浮、石油工业、医疗、机电和磁选等领域。
